  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(Server server)
      Constructor for the game adds available Maps to availableMaps creates a game timer
      Parameters:
      server - is the server where the game is started

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Game getInstance()
      Gets instance.
      Returns:
      the instance

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(ArrayList<Player> players) throws IOException
      Method to start the game initializes all global game decks (Damage cards and Upgrade cards) initializes global variables to initial value sends GameStartedMessage to all participating players
      Parameters:
      players - are the players who joined the game
      Throws:
      IOException - handles IO exceptions

    • refreshGame

      public void refreshGame()
      Method to refresh the game to an initial state necessary to start a new game from scratch

    • tooLateClients

      public ArrayList<Integer> tooLateClients()
      Method to add clients who are too late for the game into an ArrayList
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of PlayerIDs

    • specialRebootRules

      public boolean specialRebootRules()
      Method to check if special reboot rules are needed for the current game depends on the chosen map
      Returns:
      true if special reboot rules are needed

    • nextPlayerID

      public int nextPlayerID()
      Method to iterate over the active players
      Returns:
      the next active player ID

    • informAboutActivePhase

      public void informAboutActivePhase()
      Method to communicate the currently active phase of the game

    • informAboutCurrentPlayer

      public void informAboutCurrentPlayer()
      Method to communicate the currently active player of the game

    • sendToAllPlayers

      public void sendToAllPlayers​(JSONMessage jsonMessage)
      Method to send a JSONMessage to all players
      Parameters:
      jsonMessage - is the message that is sent to all players

    • refreshAdminPrivilege

      public void refreshAdminPrivilege()
      Refresh admin privilege.

    • selectMap

      public void selectMap​(String mapName) throws IOException
      Method to select a map for the game loads the dimensions of the map uses a deserializer to load the map from a JSON calls method createMapObjects() to build map
      Parameters:
      mapName - is the chosen map
      Throws:
      IOException - handles IO exceptions

    • activateBlueBelts

      public void activateBlueBelts()
      Method to activate all BlueBelts on the map. Iterates over every player in playerList and all conveyorBeltMap entries. Checks if entries within conveyorBeltMap hashmap are of Colour "blue" and moves every robot that is located on the fields of BlueBelts. Calls moveCheckPoints() for map "Twister".

    • sendNewPosition

      public void sendNewPosition​(Player player)
      Method to send a new position of a player to all players. Takes the player whose position has changed. Calls sendToAllPlayers() to inform all players about the new position.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player whose position has changed

    • activateBoardElements

      public void activateBoardElements()
      Method to activate all board elements once a register has ended. Calls every element activation method in order. Order matters!

    • activateGreenBelts

      public void activateGreenBelts()
      Method to activate GreenBelts. Iterates over every player in playerList and all conveyorBeltMap entries. Checks if entries within conveyorBeltMap hashmap are of Colour "green" and moves every robot that is located on the fields of GreenBelts.

    • activateEnergySpaces

      public void activateEnergySpaces()
      Method to activate EnergySpaces. Increases every players' energy counter whose position is on an EnergySpace.

    • activatePushPanels

      public void activatePushPanels()
      Method to activate PushPanels. Checks for the current register and triggers the corresponding PushPanels. Iterates over all players on the field of the PushPanels. Calls getRobotOnFieldOwner() to determine the players on the fields and moveRobot() to perform the push of the robot in the orientation of the PushPanel.

    • activateGears

      public void activateGears()
      Method to activate Gears. Iterates over all gearMap entries and iterates over all players on the field of the position of the Gears. Rotates every player that is found in the orientation of the Gear.

    • activateWallLasers

      public void activateWallLasers()
      Method to activate WallLasers. Iterates over all entries in laserMap and determines how far the laser shoots (by calling getLaserPath()). Every player that is found in the laser path draws a card by calling drawSpam() on the corresponding players.

    • isPermanent

      public boolean isPermanent​(String cardName)
      Is permanent boolean.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the card name
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • drawSpam

      public void drawSpam​(Player player, int amount)
      Method to make players draw Spam cards. Takes the player who draws the card and the amount which he draws. Checks if the Spam deck has enough cards to draw. Calls PickDamage if there are not enough cards so the player chooses a different damage card type to draw.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who draws Spam cards
      amount - is the amount of cards the player draws

    • sendDamage

      public void sendDamage​(Player player, ArrayList<String> damageCards)
      Method to send a DrawDamage JSONMessage.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who draws damage cards
      damageCards - is the list of damage cards the player draws

    • activateDamage

      public void activateDamage()
      Method to activate damage. Calls method sendDamage().

    • clearDamage

      public void clearDamage()
      Method to clear damage.

    • activateRobotLasers

      public void activateRobotLasers()
      Method to activate RobotLasers. Determines all alive Robots first and checks their sight path by calling triggersLasersInSight(). Only when there are Robots in the sight path the RobotLasers get triggered. Normally Robots shoot in their orientation. If the players have activated RearLaser UpgradeCard, the Robots also shoot in their inverseOrientation() -> backwards.

    • triggerLasersInSight

      public void triggerLasersInSight​(Robot robot, String orientation)
      Method to check the laser path of Robots and trigger their lasers. Lasers only get triggered when another Robot is found in the sight path. Every Robot that gets hit by the RobotLaser draws a Spam card. Takes the Robot that is shooting and the orientation the Robot shoots.
      Parameters:
      robot - is the robot that shoots the RobotLaser
      orientation - is the orientation the robot shoots in

    • getRobotsOnFieldsWithout

      public ArrayList<Robot> getRobotsOnFieldsWithout​(javafx.geometry.Point2D position, Robot withoutRobot)
      Method to get every Robot on a specific position except a specific Robot. Takes a position and a Robot that should not be included.
      Parameters:
      position - is the position that is checked
      withoutRobot - is the Robot that is not checked
      Returns:
      every Robot on the position except withoutRobot

    • getRobotsOnFields

      public ArrayList<Robot> getRobotsOnFields​(javafx.geometry.Point2D position)
      Method to get every Robot on a specific position. Takes a position.
      Parameters:
      position - is the position that is checked
      Returns:
      every Robot on the position

    • getRobotsOnFieldsOwner

      public ArrayList<Player> getRobotsOnFieldsOwner​(javafx.geometry.Point2D position)
      Method to get every owner of a Robot on a specific position. Takes a position.
      Parameters:
      position - is the position that is checked
      Returns:
      every Player whose Robot is on the specified position

    • activateCardEffect

      public void activateCardEffect​(String card)
      Method to activate card effects. Takes a card. Uses a switch on the card name. Activates specific card effect implementations in every case.
      Parameters:
      card - is the card that is activated

    • activateSpamCard

      public void activateSpamCard​(Player player)
      Activate spam card.
      Parameters:
      player - the player

    • activateMemorySwapCard

      public void activateMemorySwapCard​(Player player)
      Activate memory swap card.
      Parameters:
      player - the player

    • getUpgradeCost

      public int getUpgradeCost​(String cardName)
      Gets upgrade cost.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the card name
      Returns:
      the upgrade cost

    • replaceSpamCardsHand

      public void replaceSpamCardsHand​(Player player)
      Method to replace all Spam cards in the hand with new cards. Takes a player whose hand is being iterated for Spam cards. Draws new cards for every discarded Spam card. Used for SpamBlocker Upgrade card.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who discards Spam cards

    • rebootRobot

      public void rebootRobot​(Player player)
      Method to reboot a Robot. Takes a player, whose Robot is rebooted. Checks for specialRebootRules() on specified maps. Places the Robot of player on the corresponding restart point of the board he is located in. Makes the player draw 2 Spam cards.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player whose Robot gets rebooted

    • firstFreeStartingPoint

      public javafx.geometry.Point2D firstFreeStartingPoint()
      Method to check for a new free starting point.
      Returns:
      the position of a free starting point

    • setRebootDirection

      public void setRebootDirection()
      Method to set a reboot direction for the Robot to default: "top".

    • setRebootOrientation

      public void setRebootOrientation​(Player player, String orientation)
      Method to set a specified reboot direction for the Robot. Takes the player whose Robot gets rebooted and the orientation which he is set to.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player whose Robot gets rebooted
      orientation - is the orientation the Robot gets rebooted to

    • sendRotation

      public void sendRotation​(int playerID, String rotation)
      Method to send a JSONMessage of rotations of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - is the ID of the player
      rotation - is the rotation the players Robot takes

    • getPlayersInRadius

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayersInRadius​(Player currentPlayer, int radius)
      Method to calculate all players within the radius of a player. Primarily used for Virus card effect.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - is the player in the center
      radius - is the radius around the currentPlayer
      Returns:
      a list of all players within the radius of currentPlayer

    • isFieldNotBlocked

      public boolean isFieldNotBlocked​(Robot robot, int x, int y, String blockOrientation)
      Method to check if a field is blocked. Checks the specified field for the following Elements: Pit, Wall, Antenna Primarily used for moveRobot() method.
      Parameters:
      robot - is the Robot that currently moves - relevant for reboot routine on Pit
      x - is the x coordinate of the specified field
      y - is the y coordinate of the specified field
      blockOrientation - is the blocked orientation - relevant for Walls
      Returns:
      true if the field is not blocked

    • activateCheckpoints

      public void activateCheckpoints()
      Method to activate CheckPoints. Every player on the corresponding CheckPoint gets the achievement and JSONMessages are sent to the server.

    • moveRobot

      public void moveRobot​(Robot robot, String orientation, int movement)
      Method to perform Robot movements. Takes the robot that moves, an orientation and amount of movements. Checks if the movement can be made into the specified orientation. Calls isFieldNotBlocked() to check if the movement is valid. Iterates over the amount of movements to check for blockers after every movement.
      Parameters:
      robot - is the Robot that makes the movement
      orientation - is the orientation in which the Robot should move
      movement - is the amount of movements the Robot should take

    • getRobotOwner

      public Player getRobotOwner​(Robot robot)
      Method to find the owner (player) of a Robot.
      Parameters:
      robot - is the Robot we check
      Returns:
      the player who owns robot

    • pushRobot

      public void pushRobot​(Robot pusher, Robot robotGettingPushed, int iteration)
      Method to push a Robot, when another Robot enters the same field. Always call the method with iteration: 1. Takes a Robot who pushes (pusher), a Robot that gets pushed (robotGettingPushed) and an iteration (from 1 to 4) which helps to specify the direction in which the push is being made.
      Parameters:
      pusher - is the Robot that pushes the other Robot
      robotGettingPushed - is the Robot being pushed by pusher
      iteration - is the intrinsic iteration (always initially call with iteration: 1)

    • rotateClockwise

      public String rotateClockwise​(String orientation)
      Method to map orientation Strings on a clockwise rotation. Used for pushRobot()-
      Parameters:
      orientation - is the current orientation
      Returns:
      the clockwise rotated orientation

    • changeOrientation

      public void changeOrientation​(Robot robot, String direction)
      Method to change the orientation of a Robot. Used to adjust orientation on movements. Uses logic on switch direction to determine the new orientation of the Robot.
      Parameters:
      robot - is the Robot that changes its orientation
      direction - is the direction in which the Robot changes its orientation

    • getLaserPath

      public ArrayList<javafx.geometry.Point2D> getLaserPath​(Laser laser, javafx.geometry.Point2D laserPosition)
      Method to determine the LaserPath. Checks for blockers (Wall, CheckPoint, Robot). Ends the LaserPath on first blocker found. Laser should not shoot past Blockers.
      Parameters:
      laser - is the current laser which path is checked
      laserPosition - is the position of the laser
      Returns:
      the LaserPath in a list of fields

    • startProgrammingPhase

      public void startProgrammingPhase()
      Method to start the ProgrammingPhase. Sends JSONMessage for server communication. Makes every player draw 9 cards.

    • valideStartingPoint

      public boolean valideStartingPoint​(int x, int y)
      Method to check if a starting point is valid. Sends JSONMessages to server communication.
      Parameters:
      x - is the x coordinate of the inquired starting point
      y - is the y coordinate of the inquired starting point
      Returns:
      if the starting point is valid

    • replaceElementInMap

      public void replaceElementInMap​(ArrayList<ArrayList<ArrayList<Element>>> map, int x, int y, Element element, Object object)
      Method to replace elements on the map. Used to specify the correct subclass on the map and change it from the superclass to the subclass. Key to build the map with the correct types. Do not use outside of building the map in its initial state!
      Parameters:
      map - is the map that is being built
      x - is the x coordinate of the element
      y - is the y coordinate of the element
      element - is the element in its superclass state
      object - is the element in its subclass state

      activePhase - is the int of the active phase

      Returns:

    • isActivePhaseOn

      public boolean isActivePhaseOn()
